description:
Following Kenshin`s departure from the dojo, everyone, and especially Kaoru, are sad at being left behind. And while Saito tries to dissuade Sanosuke from following him, Megumi sends Kaoru to deliver some medicine that will aid in Kenshin`s fight
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Göz Yaşını Cesarete Dönüştür: Kaoru Kamiya`nın Seçimi
Namida o Yuuki ni Kaete! Kamiya Kaoru ga Eranda Michi
เปลี่ยนน้ำตาให้เป็นความกล้า ทางเลือกของคามิยะ คาโอรุ
涙を勇気にかえて! 神谷薫が選んだ道
